column4: jet: he said it failed so I told him to apt-get update first.
I brought Alsa flowers.  She turned me down.  Then I gave her a box of chocolates.  Same outcome.
It .. was a joke.  He asked about Alsa experts.  That's a sound driver. /rimshot fades fast
- Alsa can be a bit of a B*
- but much nicer than her worthless sister Oss
heh.
don't forget that Gates also tries to patent it and sell licenses back to Linux
- I think his sources are pointing to the CD instead of the site
- I thought it was the other way around
right, misread your message :D
but it doesn't work the same way as in Windows...
of course... :D...
... for the same reason that Macs haven't done the same
then why does AMD exist if Microsoft provides the cheap hardware?
the people to blame are the people in the Unix wars... if they weren't so busy fighting in the late 80s then they would have been able to stop Microsoft
the x86 chips are soooo 1993 anyway
so there were, but the point is that they turned their back on MS
... until it was too late
MS is still very dangerous, but I agree that Google is starting to become evil
http://www.landley.net/notes.html and search 'Paul Graham'.  MS is dead.  Also check out 'Stallman' on same page.
MS still has its hands in too many pies and I don't think that Canonical is going to be in a position to seize control of the desktop market by 08
